name: Toll Free SMS
author: Mallikarjun Yawalkar

sections.description:
Toll Free SMS is a wordpress plugin that lets you send Free SMS to your subscribers using your Way2SMS account without leaving wordpress admin area.

You must have a valid Way2SMS account for using this plugin.

Check out the screenshots.

Localization

  • English – (en_EN)
sections.installation:
1. Upload Toll Free SMS plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Toll Free SMSMenu under Dashboard Menu and login with your Way2SMS account and start sending sms.
sections.faq:
1. Does it cost anything to me?

No. As We are using the Way2SMS account for this, it won’t cost a single penny to you.

2. Can I register Way2SMS account using this plugin?

No. You must register and activate the Way2SMS accoun, for using this plugin. Its almost free.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed Warning Warning: curl_setopt() [function.curl-setopt]: CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION
    cannot be activated when safe_mode is enabled or an open_basedir is set in public_html/blog/wp-content/plugins/toll-free-sms/tfs.curl.class.php on line 82

1.0

  • First public release
  • Tested on WordPress 3.4.1
